TopicTitle: How to turn off tracking station icons?

Articles.Content:
I'm trying to figure out how to turn off all tracking station icons when I launch a craft. So when I launch a craft and open the map, all of these icons will be deselected:

Does anyone know how to do this? I tried deselecting all the icons in both the Tracking Station and the map, but those changes didn't stay.

The reason why I'm trying to do this is because it should help a lot with loading times for both launching crafts and flying a craft from the Tracking Station.
